arguments.name: paths
arguments.description: The paths where to find modules or packages to analyze. More than one path is allowed.

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --min
options.description: The minimum complexity to display (default to A).

options.name: --max
options.description: The maximum complexity to display (default to F).

options.name: --show-complexity
options.description: Whether or not to show the actual complexity score together with the A-F rank. Default to False.

options.name: --average
options.description: If True, at the end of the analysis display the average complexity. Default to False.

options.name: --exclude
options.description: Exclude files only when their path matches one of these glob patterns. Usually needs quoting at the command line.

options.name: --ignore
options.description: Ignore directories when their name matches one of these glob patterns: radon won't even descend into them. By default, hidden directories (starting with '.') are ignored.

options.name: --order
options.description: The ordering function. Can be SCORE, LINES or ALPHA.

options.name: --no-assert
options.description: Do not count `assert` statements when computing complexity.

options.name: --show-closures
options.description: Add closures/inner classes to the output.

options.name: --total-average
options.description: Like `-a, --average`, but it is not influenced by `min` and `max`. Every analyzed block is counted, no matter whether it is displayed or not.

options.name: --xml
options.description: Format results in XML (compatible with CCM).

options.name: --ipynb-cells
options.description: Include reports for individual IPYNB cells
